00068 ConnectionHandler::ConnectionHandler(Comm *comm, ApplicationQueuePtr &app_queue,
00069     RangeServerPtr range_server, MasterClientPtr &master_client)
00070   : m_comm(comm), m_app_queue_ptr(app_queue), m_range_server_ptr(range_server),
00071     m_master_client_ptr(master_client), m_shutdown(false) {

00078                                      RangeServerPtr range_server)
00079   : m_comm(comm), m_app_queue_ptr(app_queue), m_range_server_ptr(range_server),

00087 void ConnectionHandler::handle(EventPtr &event) {
00088 
00089   if (m_shutdown)
00090     return;
00091 
00092   if (event->type == Event::MESSAGE) {
00093     ApplicationHandler *handler = 0;
00094 
00095     //event->display();
00096 
00097     try {
00098 
00099       // sanity check command code
00100       if (event->header.command < 0
00101           || event->header.command >= RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_MAX)
00102         HT_THROWF(PROTOCOL_ERROR, "Invalid command (%llu)",
00103                   (Llu)event->header.command);
00104 
00105       switch (event->header.command) {
00106       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_COMPACT:
00107         handler = new RequestHandlerCompact(m_comm, m_range_server_ptr.get(),
00108                                             event);
00109         break;
00110       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_LOAD_RANGE:
00111         handler = new RequestHandlerLoadRange(m_comm, m_range_server_ptr.get(),
00112                                               event);
00113         break;
00114       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_UPDATE:
00115         handler = new RequestHandlerUpdate(m_comm, m_range_server_ptr.get(),
00116                                            event);
00117         break;
00118       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_CREATE_SCANNER:
00119         handler = new RequestHandlerCreateScanner(m_comm,
00120             m_range_server_ptr.get(), event);
00121         break;
00122       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_DESTROY_SCANNER:
00123         handler = new RequestHandlerDestroyScanner(m_comm,
00124             m_range_server_ptr.get(), event);
00125         break;
00126       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_FETCH_SCANBLOCK:
00127         handler = new RequestHandlerFetchScanblock(m_comm,
00128             m_range_server_ptr.get(), event);
00129         break;
00130       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_DROP_TABLE:
00131         handler = new RequestHandlerDropTable(m_comm, m_range_server_ptr.get(),
00132                                               event);
00133         break;
00134       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_REPLAY_BEGIN:
00135         handler = new RequestHandlerReplayBegin(m_comm,
00136             m_range_server_ptr.get(), event);
00137         break;
00138       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_REPLAY_LOAD_RANGE:
00139         handler = new RequestHandlerReplayLoadRange(m_comm,
00140             m_range_server_ptr.get(), event);
00141         break;
00142       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_REPLAY_UPDATE:
00143         handler = new RequestHandlerReplayUpdate(m_comm,
00144             m_range_server_ptr.get(), event);
00145         break;
00146       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_REPLAY_COMMIT:
00147         handler = new RequestHandlerReplayCommit(m_comm,
00148             m_range_server_ptr.get(), event);
00149         break;
00150       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_DROP_RANGE:
00151         handler = new RequestHandlerDropRange(m_comm, m_range_server_ptr.get(),
00152                                               event);
00153         break;
00154       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_STATUS:
00155         handler = new RequestHandlerStatus(m_comm, m_range_server_ptr.get(),
00156                                            event);
00157         break;
00158       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_SHUTDOWN:
00159         m_shutdown = true;
00160         handler = new RequestHandlerShutdown(m_comm, m_range_server_ptr.get(),
00161                                              event);
00162         break;
00163       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_DUMP_STATS:
00164         handler = new RequestHandlerDumpStats(m_comm, m_range_server_ptr.get(),
00165                                               event);
00166         break;
00167       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_GET_STATISTICS:
00168         handler = new RequestHandlerGetStatistics(m_comm,
00169             m_range_server_ptr.get(), event);
00170         break;
00171       default:
00172         HT_THROWF(PROTOCOL_ERROR, "Unimplemented command (%llu)",
00173                   (Llu)event->header.command);
00174       }
00175       m_app_queue_ptr->add(handler);
00176     }
00177     catch (Exception &e) {
00178       ResponseCallback cb(m_comm, event);
00179       HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00180       std::string errmsg = format("%s - %s", e.what(), get_text(e.code()));
00181       cb.error(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, errmsg);
00182     }
00183   }
00184   else if (event->type == Event::CONNECTION_ESTABLISHED) {
00185 
00186     HT_INFOF("%s", event->to_str().c_str());
00187 
00192     if (m_master_client_ptr)
00193       m_app_queue_ptr->add(new EventHandlerMasterConnection(m_master_client_ptr,
00194                            m_range_server_ptr->get_location(), event));
00195   }
00196   else {
00197     HT_INFOF("%s", event->to_str().c_str());
00198   }
00199 
00200 }
